entry.title: Tough Tested Transformer X Bluetooth Earbuds w/ Noise Cancellation + Power Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tough Tested
Type: Consumer Electronics:Portable Audio & Headphones:Headphones
Price: 69.99




Tough Tested Transformer X Wireless Earbuds w/ Noise Cancellation + Power Pack


Description:

High quality contraction. Very durable, perfect for when your are on the job or casually listening to music.
The Transformer X is the world's first no compromise convertible personal earbuds. Designed for enjoying high quality music and for taking important phone calls in the noisiest environments. We built the most advanced personal and professional headset by applying best-in-class technologies used by leading handset, computer and speaker manufacturers

Last Up to 10 hours Talk & Play

NOISE REDUCTION:
OSHA compliant NRR23 db noise reduction up to 30% 85db maximum volume for hearing protection
NOISE CANCELLING: isolation earbuds with flex foam and tree tips
PART NAME: TT-HFB-TX

Additional Battery pack included.
Provides an additional 32 hours of charge.

MSRP: $109.99 (earbuds) + $49.99 (battery) = Total $159.98

Compatibility:
All Bluetooth enabled smartphones

Condition:
NEW

WEIGHT: 0.28 lbs
DIMENSIONS: 9.65" x 7.17" x 1.54"

entry.title: Razer Nari Essential Wireless 7.1 Surround Sound Gaming Headset PC PS4 New DEAL
entry.summary:
Vendor: Razer
Type: Video Games & Consoles:Video Game Accessories:Headsets
Price: 99.99




Razer Nari Essential Wireless 7.1 Surround Sound Gaming Headset PC PS4 New

Description:

The Razer Nari Essential is designed for gamers who seek core features, superior comfort and incredible sound in a wireless gaming headset. An auto-adjusting headband fits the headset onto the unique shape of your head, while its aluminum body makes it lightweight to wear and provides durability. With plush leatherette ear cushions that completely cover your ears, enjoy superior sound isolation without compromising on comfort. THX Spatial Audio delivers next-generation virtual surround sound for a more powerful immersive experience.

  • THX SPATIAL AUDIO: Breaks the boundaries of defined 5.1 and 7.1 channel surround to deliver seamless 360° positional audio for a more natural and lifelike experience
  • TOTAL ENHANCED COMFORT: Its auto-adjusting headband comfortably fits your head while its unibody aluminum frame keeps it lightweight even after hours of wear
  • 2.4 GHz WIRELESS AUDIO: With audio controls directly on the headset, you can do everything from adjusting volume to muting your mic on the fly
  • 16-HOUR BATTERY LIFE: Enjoy up to 16 hours of uninterrupted gaming, streaming or movies. With a battery that just goes on, you can stay immersed in all your favorite entertainment
  • FLIP MICROPHONE: With a flip microphone featuring passive noise cancellation, your every shout-call is heard with crystal clear clarity
Product Identifiers
Brand Razer
MPN RZ04-02690100-R3U1
UPC 8886419371861
Model Nari
eBay Product ID (ePID) 13024824236

entry.title: NITECORE HC35 2700 Lumen USB Rechargeable 21700 Headlamp
entry.s:type: Sporting Goods:Outdoor Sports:Camping & Hiking:Flashlights, Lanterns & Lights:Headlamps
entry.summary:
Vendor: NITECORE
Type: Sporting Goods:Outdoor Sports:Camping & Hiking:Flashlights, Lanterns & Lights:Headlamps
Price: 129.99




NITECORE HC35 2700 Lumen USB Rechargeable 21700 Headlamp

Description:

  • 2700 max lumen quad LED headlamp
  • 90 degree L-shape design easily removable flashlight body to double as work light
  • Included 21700 high performance rechargeable battery
  • Built-in micro USB charging port, LED battery indicator

Next-Gen, High Performance Headlamp

The NITECORE HC35 L-shaped headlamp is the first next generation headlamp to feature a high performance 21700 battery. This powerful battery unleashes the quad LEDs max brightness of 2700 lumens turbo with over 146 yards of beam throw. The quick detach headlamp bracket allows you to easily rotate the flashlight on the headband to illuminate where you need it.

Convenient Battery Options

The NITECORE HC35 comes with a high performance, 4000mAh 21700 li-ion battery that provides up to 1200 hours of uninterrupted operation. It can also run on any >8 high discharge 18650 battery, a pair of CR123, or RCR123 batteries when you use included battery adapter sleeve. With a built-in micro USB charging port, and LED power indicator, the HC35 will not leave you in the dark when paired with a rechargeable battery.

Versatile L-Shape Design

When removed from the bracket the multipurpose, 90 degree design allows the headlamp to double as a handheld flashlight or worklight. Enjoy hands-free illumination with the magnetic tailcap, while the removable pocket clip provides simple carry options.

Contents in Package: HC35 Headlamp, NL2140HP 4000mAh 21700 Rechargeable Battery, Spare O-ring, Clip, Headband, Bracket, 18650/2xCR123 Battery Adapter, USB Charging Cable, Lanyard

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS

LED 4x CREE XP-G3 S3 LEDs
Maximum Brightness 2700 lumens
Peak Beam Distance 146 yards
Peak Beam Intensity 4500 cd
IP Rating IP68 - 2m submersible
Impact Resistance 1 m
Dimensions L-5.05"xW-1.25"xH-1.02"
Weight 4.89 (Bracket and Headband Included)oz

BRIGHTNESS OUTPUTS

MODE OUTPUT RUNTIME
Turbo 2,7000 lumens 45 min
High 800 lumens 3 hr
Mid 270 lumens 8 hr 15 min
Low 40 lumens 52 hr
Ultralow 1 lumen 50 days
Strobe 2,700 lumens
Beacon 2,700 lumens
SOS 2,700 lumens
